data.content:
Anh - Anh
conditions
circumstances affecting the functioning or existence of something.
→ condition

Kết hợp từ & Cấu trúc câu
conditions
n.
circumstances
1) favorable; unfavorable conditions
2) difficult; normal; pitiful, squalid; repressive conditions
3) living; weather; working conditions (if weather conditions permit)
4) in conditions (they live in squalid conditions)
5) under conditions (to work under difficult conditions)

Từ điển Kỹ thuật (EN)
